tool_description:
The Identity Server API serves as the cornerstone for managing authentication and authorization within your application ecosystem. Designed to provide secure access control and user authentication services, it offers a robust set of features tailored to meet the demands of modern web and mobile applications.
Built with ASP.NET, Postgres, RabbitMQ, Kubernetes, Microservices and Google Cloud.

Documentation is here: https://chris-briddock.github.io/ChristopherBriddock.Identity/api/ChristopherBr...
name: Identity Server
title: Identity Server

api_list.name: /2fa/codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://identity-server1.p.rapidapi.com/2fa/codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "identity-server1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
